comments: Kalipada P. Biswas in TL2 probably an error for Kali P. Biswas.
examples: 'P' examples: Elaphoglossum ballardianum Biswas in Bull. Misc. Inform. Kew 1939: 239. 'S' example: Gentiana andersonii Biswas in Hooker's Icon. Pl. 34: t. 3358. (1938)
source: Berkeley Algal List; Pichi Sermolli's list, 3 March 1991
